MAHIMA MALHOTRA
Email: mahima28.malhotra@gmail.com
Mob.: 9899829190

Professional Summary
Fresher Data Analyst with expertise in Advanced Excel (Power Query), SQL, Python Programming (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn), and Power BI. Experienced in machine learning projects and data visualization, seeking to leverage analytical skills for impactful data-driven decision making.

Technical Skills
• Programming & Languages: Java, SQL, Python Programming (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn)
• Data Visualization Tools: Power BI, Advanced Excel (Power Query), MATLAB
• Databases: SQL
• Python Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn
• Other Tools: Jupyter, Eclipse IDE, Smart Plant Instrumentation, AutoCad

Education
Course: B.Tech (Instrumentation and Control Engineering)
Institute / Organization: Bharati Vidyapeeth's College of Engineering, New Delhi
Board / University: GGSIPU
Year: 2016-20
% age/CGPA: 82.9%

Course: Class XII
Institute / Organization: Rukmini Devi Public School, New Delhi
Board / University: CBSE
Year: 2015-16
% age/CGPA: 88.47%

Course: Class X
Institute / Organization: Rukmini Devi Public School, New Delhi
Board / University: CBSE

Projects
Pneumonia detection from Chest X-ray images using Deep Learning
- Developed a deep learning model for image classification to detect pneumonia from chest X-rays.
- Utilized Python and machine learning techniques to improve diagnostic accuracy.

US Healthcare Dataset Analysis
- Performed data cleaning, transformation, and analysis on US healthcare data to extract insights on healthcare trends and costs.
- Used Advanced Excel (Power Query) for data manipulation and visualization.

E-com Orders Analysis
- Visualized and analyzed e-commerce order data to identify sales patterns, customer behavior, and key performance indicators.
- Employed Power BI with DAX and Power Query for interactive dashboards.

Certifications

MAHIMA MALHOTRA
Email: mahima28.malhotra@gmail.com
Mob.: 9899829190

Professional Summary
Fresher with foundational knowledge in SQL, Python, Machine Learning, and Advanced Excel (Power Query), complemented by hands-on projects in Deep Learning and data visualization. Seeking to leverage enhanced skills in Power BI and Python libraries for a Data Analytics role.

Technical Skills
• Programming & Languages: Java, SQL, Python, Machine Learning
• Data Visualization Tools: Power BI, Advanced Excel (Power Query), MATLAB
• Databases: SQL
• Python Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn
• Other Tools: Jupyter, Smart Plant Instrumentation, AutoCad, Eclipse IDE

Education
Course: B.Tech (Instrumentation and Control Engineering)
Institute / Organization: Bharati Vidyapeeth's College of Engineering, New Delhi
Board / University: GGSIPU
Year: 2016-20
% age/CGPA: 82.9%

Course: Class XII
Institute / Organization: Rukmini Devi Public School, New Delhi
Board / University: CBSE
Year: 2015-16
% age/CGPA: 88.47%

Course: Class X
Institute / Organization: Rukmini Devi Public School, New Delhi
Board / University: CBSE
Year: 2013-14
% age/CGPA: 10.0

Projects
Pneumonia detection from Chest X-ray images using Deep Learning
- Developed a deep learning model for image classification to detect pneumonia from chest X-rays.
- Utilized Python and machine learning libraries to preprocess and train the model.
- Achieved promising accuracy in medical image analysis.

US Healthcare Dataset Analysis
- Performed detailed data cleaning and exploratory analysis on US healthcare data to identify trends and insights.
- Utilized Power Query for data transformation and Excel functions for visualization.
- Extracted actionable insights to support healthcare decision-making.

E-com Orders Analysis
- Analyzed e-commerce order data to uncover sales patterns and customer behavior using Power BI dashboards.
- Created dynamic reports using DAX calculations and Power Query for data modeling.
- Delivered insights to optimize sales strategies and customer engagement.

Certifications
• Certification in Industrial Instrumentation – Indian Oil Corporation Limited
• Certification in JAVA - Coding Ninjas
• Certification in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence - Eckovation
• Certification for Event Coordinator – Industrial Society for automation
• Certification in Data Analytics | Coding Ninjas | 2026
